Hao Xu

2D & 3D Vision

Email: xuhao02@std.uestc.edu.cn

Web: hxwork.github.io

Biography

I am a third-year graduate student of machine learning and computer vision under the supervision of Prof.Guanghui LIU and Prof. Shuaicheng LIU at University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC). Meanwhile, I start my internship at Megvii Research since 2018. My research interests include 3D registration, 3D point cloud representation, 2D image processing, etc.

Education & Experience

SCU

Sept. 2015 - Jul. 2019

BSc in Electronic Information Engineering

Thesis GAN-based image reflection removal.

UESTC

Sept. 2019 - Present

MEng in Information and Communication Engineering

Thesis Deep learning-based 3D point cloud registration.

Megvii Research

Dec. 2018 - Present

Algorithm Researcher (Intern)

Feilds Behavior detection, gaze estimation and 3D point cloud registration.

Projects

Driver Monitor System

Major member

Dec. 2018 - Jul. 2019

I am responsible for designing a light-weighted end-to-end network running on an onboard chip to detect smoking, phoning, and drinking in driving. Participated in the overall pipeline of algorithm development, including data collection, data cleaning, algorithm development, and upgrading.

NIO Gaze Estimation

Major member

Jul. 2019 - Mar. 2020

I am responsible for designing a light-weighted end-to-end network running on an onboard chip to estimate gaze and detect eye closure and occlusion at the same time. Participated in the overall pipeline of algorithm development, including data collection, data cleaning, algorithm development, and upgrading.
